div.p: A role of a place that further classifies the setting (e.g., accident site, road side, work site, community location) in which services are delivered. (OID = 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.17660)
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Include codes from http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/RoleCode where concept is-a _ServiceDeliveryLocationRoleType

Exclude these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/RoleCode
Code
Display
_ServiceDeliveryLocationRoleType ServiceDeliveryLocationRoleType A role of a place that further classifies the setting (e.g., accident site, road side, work site, community location) in which services are delivered.
